name: duralumin
description: Duralumin is a lightweight yet remarkably strong alloy made by combining Aluminium with Copper. Its excellent strength-to-weight ratio makes it indispensable in advanced engineering and high-performance designs.

allomancy.description: Enhances the next Investiture-related ability {PAWN} uses drastically, but is consumed entirely.

feruchemy.description: Stores connection, useful for adjusting social ties or affiliations.

store.description: This pawn is storing Connection in a duralumin metalmind, severing bonds with people, places, and concepts. They become spiritually untethered â€” less grounded, less known. This may reduce social or cultural influence but allows deep storage of spiritual ties.

tap.description: This pawn is tapping a duralumin metalmind, intensifying their Connection to others. Bonds strengthen, allegiances deepen, and ties to people or places become nearly unbreakable. Useful for bonding, commanding, or interacting with spiritual systems.
